mapper.select: select rt.logofile, rt.blogtitle, rt.username, rt.id, rt.joindate from( select rownum rn, ot.logofile, ot.blogtitle, ot.username, ot.id, ot.joindate from( select logoFile, blogTitle, u.userName, u.id, to_char(joinDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') joinDate from users u, blog b where u.id = b.id and lower(blogTitle) like '%' || lower(#{keyword}) || '%' order by joinDate desc ) ot ) rt where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select rt.logofile, rt.blogtitle, rt.username, rt.id, rt.joindate from( select rownum rn, ot.logofile, ot.blogtitle, ot.username, ot.id, ot.joindate from( select logoFile, blogTitle, u.userName, u.id, to_char(joinDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') joinDate from users u, blog b where u.id = b.id and lower(userName) like '%' || lower(#{keyword}) || '%' order by joinDate desc ) ot ) rt where rn >= #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}
select count(*) from users u, blog b where u.id = b.id and blogTitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from users u, blog b where u.id = b.id and userName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
